citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
At the time of inspection, the birds at the facility did not have an environment enhancement plan that has been approved
by the attending veterinarian. Failure to maintain and follow an approved written plan can be detrimental to the
psychological health and well being of the animals. The environment enhancement plan must be in place to promote the
psychological well being of the birds. The licensee must provide and follow an enrichment plan that has been approved by
their attending veterinarian.
CORRECT BY: 10 MAY 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n
